title: For Zed, you know how you can only swap with ur E shadow once?
body:
If using ult grants another swap with ur E (so same {{champion:238}} ult but now if the E shadow is still up even after you used it to swap you can re swap with it)

Thoughts?

replies.body:
all hail pittballs

the legend continues
So, you're Pittballs. I've heard a lot about you from the fine fellows of GD.

WHY DO YOU SAY "KYS"

C'MON, I DARE YOU TO GO UP TO HIM AND SAY IT IRL.
